text: Shiok hotpot spot! Love the 9-grid style! looks good and everything fresh. Soup base solid, not too heavy. Staff friendly, place comfy. Will come again!

Wah, this spread of small dishes is seriously damn shiok! That Steamed Pork With Preserved Mustard fat and lean just nice, and the sauce is thick and fragrant until can die. Pair it with one hot bowl of white rice – confirm plus chop, gone in seconds!

The shredded potatoes are finely cut and stir-fried to a crisp. The sour and spicy flavor is appetizing, making it a great starter.​ and the vegetables are stir-fried to perfection, retaining their crispness. Light and healthy.​

Take too long to serve, not recommended to have for lunch.
Ask customer to lift up the boiling hot pot for them to light up the fire.
Staff informed if not taking beef can change to pork slice, but not being informed that it is beef based soup.
The pork belly is tender and melts in your mouth. The preserved vegetables balance the richness perfectly. Great with rice.
